title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Madrazo Hits
content:
Show Martin Madrazo you deserve a spot in his syndicate by dispatching his enemies in Madrazo Hits. These are paying out an enticing 2X GTA$ and RP, which doubles to 4X for GTA+ Members. Eliminate three Madrazo targets to complete the Weekly Challenge and get a GTA$100,000 bonus.

Bail Office owners can lend their services to Madrazo each day via the purple target icon on the map.
